com.brownian.morse.receivers

Class LatinReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brownian.morse.receivers.LatinReceiver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LatinReceiverAsync

    public class LatinReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
    Accepts a character and sends it to a MorseReceiver as an array of Morse symbols

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LatinReceiver(MorseReceiver receiver)
      Creates a LatinReceiver that sends Morse symbols to the given MorseReceiver.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static LatinReceiver getReceiver()
      A factory method that generates a LatinReceiver connected to the default MIDI Receiver.
      void send(char latinChar)
      Sends this receiver a character, which will then be translated and sent to this object's MorseReceiver.
      void send(java.lang.String latinText)
      Sends this receiver a string, whose characters will then be translated and sent to this object's MorseReceiver.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LatinReceiver

        public LatinReceiver(@NotNull
                     MorseReceiver receiver)
        Creates a LatinReceiver that sends Morse symbols to the given MorseReceiver.
        Parameters:
        receiver - A MorseReceiver that will be sent a stream of Morse symbols generated by this object.

    • Method Detail

      • getReceiver

        @NotNull
public static LatinReceiver getReceiver()
                                           throws javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException
        A factory method that generates a LatinReceiver connected to the default MIDI Receiver.
        Returns:
        A LatinReceiver that accepts text, and forwards MIDI commands describing the Morse code to a MIDI receiver.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException - if MIDI could not be loaded
        See Also:
        MidiSystem.getReceiver()

      • send

        public void send(char latinChar)
        Sends this receiver a character, which will then be translated and sent to this object's MorseReceiver.
        Parameters:
        latinChar - A character to translate and send downstream

      • send

        public void send(@NotNull
                 java.lang.String latinText)
        Sends this receiver a string, whose characters will then be translated and sent to this object's MorseReceiver.
        Parameters:
        latinText - A string to translate and send downstream
        See Also:
        send(char)
